labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify that the error message is displayed when user clicks on Register button after entering invalid values in Username field with matched password and password confirmation values

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Verify that the error message is displayed when user clicks on Register button after entering invalid values in Username field with matched password and password confirmation values

steps.name: Then  the page title should be displayed as "Registration"
When  the user enters "**************","Stars@123" and "Stars@123" in the register form
And  user clicks on Register button
Then  the user should get invalid error message as "password_mismatch:The two password fields didn’t match."

parameters.name: Error Message
parameters.value: password_mismatch:The two password fields didn’t match.
